Description.description: Describes the custom content type defined in this ManagedContentType declaration.

DeveloperName.description: Unique name for the custom content type. For example: OurSpecialContent_c

FullName.description: The full name of the content type in Metadata API. A unique name for the content type that contains only underscores and alphanumeric characters. The name must be unique across the org, begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. Query this field only if the query result contains no more than one record. Otherwise, an error is returned. If more than one record exists, use multiple queries to retrieve the records. This limit protects performance.

Language.description: The language of the content type.

MasterLabel.description: Declares the name of the content type as it appears in the UI.
